responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.text: Responsive web design (RWD) is an approach to web design which makes web pages render well on a variety of devices and window or screen sizes.

security.title: Web Security
security.text: Web Security, Email Security, and DLP may be deployed together to create a comprehensive security solution.
